dict.acceptation: 频繁的，时常发生的，常见的；（脉搏等）急促的，快的；
常到，光顾，常与…交往；常去，时常出入于；

sent.orig: Review your frequent-flier accounts often, and use the miles whenever possible.
sent.trans: 检查你的常飞顾客酬宾(frequent-flier)账户，尽可能使用打折机票。

sent.orig: The set of frequent closed patterns uniquely determines the complete set of all frequent patterns.
sent.trans: 频繁闭合模式集可唯一确定频繁模式完全集。

sent.orig: These contacts and negotiations become more frequent whenever the Japanese intensify their offensives.
sent.trans: 特别是在日寇进攻紧急的时候，这种联系和谈判就来得越多。

sent.orig: Frequent use is the key to directness of comprehension as well as of expression_r.
sent.trans: 经常地使用语言是能够直接理解和直接表达的关键。

sent.orig: Take a frequent backward look at yesterday, you will value today and look forward to tomorrow.
sent.trans: 经常的回顾昨天，你会珍惜今天并向往明天。
